Denoising.Title: Wipe away the grain
Denoising.Description: Remove decades of digital 'rust' and 'sandiness' instantly. We make blurry faces crisp again so you can see the person, not the pixels. Derustify+ users get extra quality output.

Colorization.Title: Vibrant, lifelike color
Colorization.Description: Breathe life back into black-and-white family history. Our AI understands your photos and adds colors that look real, not painted.

Batch.Title: Revive your entire album
Batch.Description: Scan old photos directly from your wall or family album with device camera, or import pre-scanned photos from your gallery. Add multipe images at a time and let the app do the work.

Privacy.Title: Absolute Privacy
Privacy.Description: Your family photos never leave your device. We don't have servers. We don't have accounts. Your private moments stay exactly where they belong: with you.

Performance.Title: Native Speed
Performance.Description: Built with high-performance technology that won't slow you down. Results directly on your screen, even without internet or in flight mode.

Safety.Title: Smart Processing
Safety.Description: Our app individually chooses the best processing method for each photo. Derustify+ users get full control over settings and can fine tune the perfect result.

Header.Title: The honest truth
Header.Subtitle: Everything you need to know about how we're different from the giants.

Q1.A: Because you shouldn't have to 'rent' software to look at your own photos. Modern companies use subscriptions to cover expensive cloud processing. Since Derustify runs on YOUR computer or phone, we have no server costs to pass on to you. You buy it, you own it. Period.

Q2.A: Yes. 100%. We physically cannot see your photos. All the AI magic happens inside your device's memory. No internet connection is required to restore images.

Q3.Q: Will it work on my device?
Q3.A: Derustify is built for modern Windows (10/11) and Android (8.0+). If you have a decent phone or a computer with a graphics card, it will be incredibly fast. If your device is older, it still works—it just takes a few extra seconds to 'clean' each photo.

Q4.Q: What's the catch with the Free version?
Q4.A: The free version has all the power of the Pro version. We just add a small watermark to the corner of your exported images. Upgrading to Pro removes the watermark and unlocks batch processing for those large boxes of family photos in the attic.

Q5.Q: Can I use it as a gift?
Q5.A: Absolutely. It's the perfect gift for the family historian, for your grandparents or anyone in the family that would appreciate restored memories. Purchase it once, install it on the family PC, and spend an afternoon rescuing the family archives together.

Q6.Q: Are the recolored images historically accurate?
Q6.A: No, the recolored images may have historical inaccuracies. The AI models are trained to restore color or to upscale images based on large samples of training data and often succeeds in correct output. Inaccurecies or inadequate coloring of images may occur, and Derustify does not gurarantee perfect results for all images.
